Step Free Access

Category A Station

This station is mobility scooter friendly

Step-free access to all platforms via fairly steep ramps (up to 50m long). Please allow sufficient time for your connecting service if you are changing trains at this station.

To find our more about travelling around this station, please see the 360 map click here
